sense.def:
Kadar stojimo ali počivamo
on something
, je tista stvar pod nami in podpira našo težo.

seg.quote: They were sitting on chairs.
...a cow grazing on a hill.
Put the tray on the bed, please.

sense.def:
Kdor je
on a bus, train, or plane
, se pelje z avtobusom, vlakom ali letalom.

seg.quote: Afterwards they got on a bus and went to the cinema.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
on a surface or object
, se drži določene površine ali predmeta ali je pritrjeno nanj.

seg.quote: ...the posters on the walls.
...the light on the ceiling.
...the buttons on a shirt.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
on a piece of paper
, je napisano ali natisnjeno na papirju.

seg.quote: ...the table on the back page of the book.
She wrote it down on a piece of paper.

sense.def:
To put on a piece of clothing
pomeni obleči si oblačilo.

seg.quote: She put her shoes on.
She had her coat on.

sense.def:
To have something on someone
pomeni imeti nekaj pri sebi, na primer v žepu ali vrečki.

Stavba, ki je
on a road
, stoji tik ob cesti.

seg.quote: The house is on Pacific Avenue.

sense.def:
Besedo
on
lahko uporabimo, ko govorimo o kraju, kjer nekdo dela ali živi. Na primer, nekdo lahko dela
on a farm or a building site
ali živi
on a housing estate
.

Kadar se poškodujemo
on something
, z delom telesa po nesreči ob nekaj udarimo.

seg.quote: He cut himself on the gatepost.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
on a particular day or date
, se zgodi tistega dne ali na tisti datum.

seg.quote: ...on the first day of term.
...on Thursday night.
Caro was born on April 10th.

sense.def:
Z besedo
on
povemo, da je nekemu dogodku sledil še eden. Na primer, če se je nekaj zgodilo
on someone's return
, se je zgodilo takoj po njegovi vrnitvi.

seg.quote: ‘It's so unfair,’ Clarissa said on her return.
On being called ‘young lady’, she laughed.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
on an instrument, machine, or system
, tisto naredimo tako, da uporabimo tisti pripomoček, stroj ali sistem.

seg.quote: ...waltzes played on the violin.
His first film was shown on television yesterday.
They work on a rota system.

sense.def:
Kadar je stroj ali luč
on
, je vključena ali prižgana in deluje.

seg.quote: A tap had been left on.

sense.def:
Knjige, razprave, pripombe ali misli
on a particular subject
govorijo o določeni temi.

seg.quote: ...books on philosophy, art, and religion.
They occasionally commented on how good her work was.
...brooding on the events that had taken place.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj učinkuje
on someone
, na nekoga vpliva ali deluje.

seg.quote: The effect on the environment could be considerable.

sense.def:
Taxes or profits on something
je davek na nekaj ali dobiček od nečesa.

seg.quote: ...a new sales tax on luxury goods.
Profits on books will be down.
You pay interest on your mortgage.

sense.def:
To spend money on something
pomeni potrošiti denar za kaj.

seg.quote: ...the amount of money he spent on clothes.
Why waste money on them?

sense.def:
To spend time on something
pomeni porabiti čas za nekaj.

seg.quote: I spent a lot of time on this picture.

sense.def:
Besedo
on
uporabljamo za nekaterimi glagoli, kadar želimo povedati, kaj je še vpleteno, zlasti ko gre za napad, zanašanje na koga ali uporabo.

seg.quote: The dog turned on her and bit her.
Never rely on your memory.
Beveridge's calculations were all based on 1938 prices.

sense.def:
Z besedo
on
povemo, da se nekaj nadaljuje ali da se oseba ali stvar premika naprej.

seg.quote: I read on.
He urged them on as they charged up Sayer Street.

sense.def:
To be on a council or committee
pomeni biti v svetu ali odboru.

To be on a drug
ali
to live on a particular kind of food
pomeni redno uživati določeno zdravilo ali vrsto hrane.

seg.quote: She was on pills of various kinds.

sense.def:
To be on a particular kind of income
pomeni imeti določeno vrsto prihodkov.

seg.quote: ...people on a low income.

sense.def:
Dogodek, ki je
on
, se dogaja.

seg.quote: The war was on then.
What's on at the Odeon?
The drinks were always on him.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
goes on at someone
ali
goes on about something
, nas stalno nadleguje s svojim vsiljivim ali dolgočasnim govorjenjem;

seg.quote: He's always on at me about the way I dress.
He's always on about yoga.
What are you on about?

sense.def:
Kar se dogaja
on and off
, se dogaja v presledkih.

Kadar nekdo
has a lot on
, ima zelo veliko dela. Kadar nekdo
does not have much on
, nima veliko dela;
